markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Overwhelm](/Actions.aspx?ID=1159) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 74

</column>

---

The tyrannosaurus bears down on an enemy and pins it with its jaws. The tyrannosaurus makes a jaws Strike; on a hit, the target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).
name: Overwhelm
